AdjCausDisc is a package uses inputed data and a specific Adjacency matrix that provides the structure of a Directed Acyclic graph to provide a value of the coefficients using either the spike and slab prior or the SSVS bayesian variable selection technique. 

The Adjacency matrix will be a matrix of entries of 1s and 0s that is lower diagonals that shows the connections between the Y variables, the p


$$
\begin{bmatrix} 
	a & b & c \\
	c & d & d\\
	e & f & g \\
	\end{bmatrix}
$$
